<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Thaumaturgy](/Feats.aspx?ID=3744) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Thaumaturge](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=186)

**Prerequisites**
[Thaumaturge Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3743)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [thaumaturge feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=22/feats) of your choice.

<title level="2">Basic Thaumaturgy leads to...</title>
[Advanced Thaumaturgy](/Feats.aspx?ID=3745)
name: Basic Thaumaturgy
